faqs.q: How many calories is in a slice of cheesecake?
faqs.a: Approximately 350 kcal for a standard slice.

faqs.q: What are the macros in one slice of cheesecake?
faqs.a: About 30g carbs, 25g fat, 5g protein, with 15g saturated fat.
Yes, a slice typically has around 20g of sugars from cream cheese and crust.

faqs.q: How does slice size affect calories in cheesecake?
faqs.a: Larger slices (150g+) can exceed 500 kcal; smaller ones under 250 kcal.
Yes, low-fat or no-bake versions reduce calories by 100+ kcal per slice.
